label: StabilityPrediction
description: Predicts Stability Prediction using tools like ThermoMPNN-D

parameters.label: Output Folder
parameters.desc: Path to which the output will be written. Defaults to the directory containing the input data.

parameters.label: File Basename
parameters.desc: Basename for the generated output files. Defaults to the basename of the input data.

parameters.label: SSM mode
parameters.desc: SSM mode to use: single, additive, epistatic

parameters.label: PDB Bank ID
parameters.desc: PDB ID from PDBBank to download and use

parameters.label: pdb file
parameters.desc: PDB file to use as input

parameters.label: batch size
parameters.desc: Batch size for stability prediction module

parameters.label: chains
parameters.desc: Chains to run on.  Empty string will default to all.  Otherwise 'A B C' is an example to run on A, B, and C.  Default will be ''

parameters.label: threshold
parameters.desc: Threshold for SSM sweep. By default, ThermoMPNN only saves mutations below this threshold (-0.5 kcal/mol). To save all mutations, set this really high (e.g., 100)

parameters.label: distance
parameters.desc: Filter for double mutant predictions using pairwise Ca distance cutoff (default is 5 A).

parameters.label: ss penalty
parameters.desc: Add explicit disulfide breakage penalty. Default is False.
